title: Infinite Update Loop FIX!!!!
body:
Shoutout to Bilalipop9 for this fix. All I did was simply:

Set my clock to 2 hours behind.
Then I went to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and ran lol.launcher.admin.exe as ADMINISTRATOR 
Windows might tell you the client is not responding, but ignore that and select "wait for program".
Soon the orange bar that says "Play" will pop up.
The login screen will come up, and there most likely will be that message everyone has been getting, but there will be NO restart client message. 
Just simply click "Okay", and log in .
I'm currently logged on with no issues.

replies.body: Bless. This shit was tilting me before I was even logged in.
When i try to do this it always tells me unspecified error occured please help!
This issue should be resolved now!

What he said. I set my date 2 days back and ran as administrator, the pop up still showed but didn't restart, so I went to gear and initialized a repair. Ever since that, and keeping the date 2 days behind and running as administrator, I haven't had problems since.

If you can get this to work, this works until you try to close the client and then it starts looping all over again.
Even running lol.launcher.admin to bring up the old client launcher can make this work once.  Then you have to stay on or you get the loop again even if you run the admin file.
Another option someone mentioned is to unplug your router after you get the first popup, restart and then when you get the login screen, plug it back in.
You're a hero! I've been trying everything, couldn't get it to work. Thanks!
